scripts.test:watch: npm run test && chokidar 'src/**/*.spec.ts' -c 'npm run test'
scripts.test:ui: npm run pretest && npx playwright test -c dist/e2e-tests --trace on --ui
scripts.test:headed: npm run pretest && npx playwright test -c dist/e2e-tests --trace on --headed
scripts.test:watch:headed: npm run test:headed && chokidar 'src/**/*.spec.ts' -c 'npm run pretest'
